title: Change notification reminder interval from 6 hours to 4 hours

requirements.summary: Update the service worker notification interval from 6 hours to 4 hours
acceptanceCriteria: The service worker `sw.js` uses a 4-hour interval (14,400,000 ms) for the repeating notification schedule instead of 6 hours.
No references to the old 6-hour interval remain in `sw.js`.
The notification still fires correctly when started, sending a reminder with a motivational quote.

file_operations.description: Change the repeating notification interval from 6 hours (6 * 60 * 60 * 1000 = 21,600,000 ms) to 4 hours (4 * 60 * 60 * 1000 = 14,400,000 ms). Update the setInterval call to use 14,400,000 ms and revise any related comments or constants that reference the 6-hour schedule to reflect the new 4-hour interval.
